 2008-04792008-02-28,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of J. STEPHENS ALLAN of Calgary, Alberta to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of four years.
